interactables.name: Axe Interactable
dialogue: The metal on the axe is nearly flawless aside from the few chips on the edges.

interactables.name: Shield Interactable
dialogue: Dents and scratches are scattered across the wooden shield.
The shield looks different from the ones crafted in the village.

interactables.name: Fire Interactable
dialogue: The flames in front of you are hot enough to burn your skin even from a distance.
Use Waterbolt to put out the fire?
